document_title: Gastritis antrum: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content:
Patients may experience dangerous complications or persistent inflammation that recurs many times, especially accompanied by Hp infection and prolonged use of alcohol and tobacco:
Hemorrhagic stomach ulcer; Severe atrophic gastritis; Gastric pyloric stenosis; Stomach cancer
